newsitem.title: UK: Banque Indosuez to launch $200 mln FRN - dealers.
newsitem.headline: Banque Indosuez to launch $200 mln FRN - dealers.

text.p: Banque Indosuez will launch a subordinated structured $200 million FRN early next week, primary market players said on Friday. Dealers said Citibank International and Morgan Stanley & Co International would lead manage the 10-year deal.
There will be a once only call after 2.5 years.
The notes were expected to pay LIBOR plus 30 basis points stepping up to 100 b.p. after five years. Banque Indosuez's subordinated debt is rated A1/A.
